description: shapes in brown and black washes on off-white paper; light brown rectangle at top, black shape with pointed lower tip at center and other abstracted shapes in lower one-half of sheet; off-white mat; framed behind glass in dark brown wood frame
provenance: The artist; (Knoedler & Co., New York, sold to Mersky); Mary and Bob Mersky, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2011.
signed: LR, below image, in pencil: Walker 74
title: Untitled
